Opisanie
Luchshie games from publisher Alawar for February 2014Alawar Entertainment - a company specializing in the development and dissemination of computer games for the mass audience of users on personal computers, mobile platforms , gaming consoles and other platforms.Previously, the company Alawar Entertainment has specialized in publishing casual- games , but now the company has focused on developing and publishing free-to-play- games. During the work the company had published more than 300 of its own gaming brands.
